97137.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「お客さまから見て:
On your right hand side, inside the bar, are stairs you can go up to reach the audience seating.
Only, due to the ghost buffalogre's uproar, the stands aren't as packed as they used to be, I suppose...

97234.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「格闘場の中から 物:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>A noise came from the Monster Arena!! N-no way, the
vengeful spirit again...!? Hieeeeeh!!

97236.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「まさか ここには怨:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>No way, the vengeful spirit's not coming here, is it?
Say, tell it not to show up! Pleeease!!

97237.魔物を運ぶ エレベーターのようだ。\n<br>\nエレベーターに乗り 闘いの広間:
Looks like the monster transport elevator.
Take the elevator to the monster arena?

103441.魔物を運ぶ エレベーターのようだ。\n<br>\nしかし こちら側は カギがかか:
Looks like the monster transport elevator.
But it's locked.

97245.「お客さまから見て 右手に進んだ先の \n 酒場内にある 階段を上っていただきま:
On your right hand side, inside the bar, are stairs you can go up to reach the audience seating.
Only, the stands aren't as packed as they used to be, I suppose...

70567.魔物を運ぶ エレベーターのようだ。: Looks like the monster transport elevator.

70568.「王様から 任命されて\n ここの通用口の番をやってるんだけどさ\n そろそろ:
The King assigned me to guard the service entrance
here, but I wonder how long until shift-change.

65938.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ニャヒヒー！:
Nyahihii! I think as someone who comes to this Monster Arena all the time, the ongoing battle...
Will be over before you know it! Nyahiihihi!

70569.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「バトルショーを:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>After viewing the Battle Show, it would be a good
idea to have a little drink at our establishment.

70570.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「この近くには:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>This area is where dangerous monsters that have been
captured are. Don't approach them recklessly!

70571.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「お客さまから見:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>As you can see, on your right hand side are stairs
inside the tavern that will take you to the audience
seating.

65939.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「すぐそこにある階段:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Go up those stairs there to watch the Battle Show
from the stands. I really want to go up and watch
too, but I can't stand the sight of blood......

70572.「そこの姉ちゃん 王様に盾つくとは\n なかなかの度胸をしてるが\n あれじゃ:
That girl there has some guts defying the King like
that, but even that's not enough to stay alive long.

70573.「ったく ショーが 台無しになっちまった。\n まあ 食べ物を 全部 売り切った:
Man, you totally spoiled the show. Well, at least all
the food sold out; I'm happy about that.

70574.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「あんたの連れさ:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>You brought her, what the heck were you thinking?
She robbed everyone of their joy; how cruel.
